back.title: Outing
back.subtitle: Team Member
back.body: In the span of 24 hours, my team has been able to build an app to help with organising social events and everything was made from scratch including both back-end and front-end. Check it out  at https://devpost.com/software/outing-c0i8dw !

back.title: MEng Computing
back.subtitle: First Year Undergraduate
back.body: In the course of our first year, we have learned Java, C, Haskell and x86-64 Assembler. For our group project that is due in in June, we are writing an ARM11 emulator in C. Please stay tune and follow my GitHub!
